head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BRADLEY, GERALDINE (POWELL), M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BRADLEY, GERALDINE (POWELL), M.D.

block.p: BRADLEY-Geraldine (Powell), M.D. On July 25, 2000, of Wynnewood, PA. Loving wife of the late Dr. Stanley E., beloved mother of Dr. Jane Alavi. Services at Bringhurst Funeral Home, at West Laurel Hill Cemetery, 225 Belmont Avenue, Bala Cynwyd, PA Friday, 7/28 at 11 AM. Interment West Laurel Hill Cemetery. Donations in Dr. Bradley's name may be made to the University of Pennsylvania Cancer Center, 3400 Spruce Street, Philadelphia, PA. 19104.
